ai-tha-ap110:1.3_0: I’ve given a seat to someone else,
ai-tha-ap110:2.3_0: the teacher pays homage to the teacher,
ai-tha-ap110:3.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
ai-tha-ap110:3.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
ai-tha-ap110:3.4_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated.
ai-tha-ap110:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap110:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap110:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
ai-tha-ap110:8.1_0: Eight senior monks, incors of the senior monks.
